column4: what is the best pop3 / stmp email access program for gutsy if someone can pm me the awnser to my question please because the channel moves to fast for me
i was not conducting a poll ubotu i was asking a question
yah i tried evolution Scunizi but it did not work for me
just one able to connect to a stmp and or pop3 server
so i can check my email via my website that i own
Use evolution.  It's the ltitle mail icon on the top of your screen (in the middle of the three)
You want to host your own mail, on your home box, so you can connect (to your home box) and get your email?
Or you want to connect to your ISPs (whatever) POP and SMTP servers with an email client?
Right.  So, you want a central mail repository, that grab sstuff from various POP sources
Outlook is just a mail client, if I have all my mail on outlook on box A, can I view that mail on box B?
you need a mail client?  or you want to view your mail (stored on box A) from box B?
right, thats just a regular mail client.  Evolution will work fine for you.
What about it doesn't work for you?  "It doesn't work" doesn't tell us a whole lot about whats going wrong
alright, well, we'll be happy to help you diagnose it.  If you're looking for non-evolution alternatives, there are plenty.  One that comes to mind is Thunderbird
Or like bloody` said, run synaptic and you can browse them
you can sort by different things in synaptic, if you sort by installed packages, it'll show you them
